title: Citi Joins Mayor of London's Team
summary: London – Citigroup is a founding corporate partner in Team London, the new volunteering campaign launched by Mayor Boris Johnson to mobilize 10,000 Londoners.
tag-1: Citi Joins Mayor of London's Team
tag-2: London – Citigroup is a founding corporate partner in Team London, the new volunteering campaign launched by Mayor Boris Johnson to mobilize 10,000 Londoners.
tag-3: The project will encourage citizens to become involved in community projects that transform and improve quality of life in London and bolster the city's sense of community.
tag-4: The campaign will initially support six large-scale projects, focusing on key initiatives to tackle crime, increase literacy and create opportunities for young people.
tag-5: Based on the "Cities of Service" model pioneered by New York Mayor Michael Bloomberg and now implemented in more than 100 cities in the U.S., London is the first city outside the U.S. to develop its own plan to bring individuals, public, private and voluntary organizations together to change communities.
tag-6: Boris Johnson said: "All across the capital, ordinary Londoners are making an extraordinary difference by volunteering their time. We want to harness this incredible goodwill and the generous philanthropy of the capital's businesses to make London a safer, cleaner, greener and stronger city. Evidence shows that when we get involved in our city, we all feel better about our city. I'm calling on everyone to sign up and be a part of Team London, so together we can make the best big city in the world."
tag-7: Hilary Gal, Head of Citizenship for EMEA at Citi, added: "We know how effective volunteering can be in creating positive change in communities. Citi employees have always been involved in volunteer work, so supporting the Team London project was an easy decision. We look forward to being part of Team London and working with the mayor's office to create new volunteering initiatives."
tag-9: In addition, individual grants will be provided for small community groups and charities.
tag-10: Citi attended Mayor Johnson's Team London launch, which was supported by Samantha Cameron, the Reuben Foundation and a number of high-profile individuals across London.
tag-11: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions.
